column5: With more than enough room for entertaining large families and guests, this spacious and updated home boasts a wide open floorplan upstairs and down, with a large kitchen and dining room and two living areas and his and hers master baths. The gorgeous views of Little Bay, lifts for a boat and jets and fish cleaning station make this a perfect choice for those who love water activities. The private community pools adds to the appeal This home has something for everyone to enjoy.
column8: Upscale Key Allegro Home with Little Bay Views
